ai-tha-ap331:0.3_0: Hearing this Fleast between the senior monks,
ai-tha-ap331:1.2_0: the world, for the world of the gods,
ai-tha-ap331:3.1_0: He has cut the net of his sword,
ai-tha-ap331:3.3_0: The Teacher, standing in the Saṅgha,
ai-tha-ap331:5.2_0: The world’s savings is a shelter in the world.
ai-tha-ap331:5.3_0: if he sends him away when sent him away;
ai-tha-ap331:5.4_0: I’m not quenched in the air.
ai-tha-ap331:6.2_0: he risen from the water to the bridge.
ai-tha-ap331:6.3_0: standing in front of the Buddha,
ai-tha-ap331:6.4_0: like a fish entering a net.
ai-tha-ap331:7.3_0: I’m not aware of any bad places
ai-tha-ap331:9.1_0: Attaining the four kinds of textual analysis
ai-tha-ap331:10.1_0: That is how these verses were recited by the senior venerable Nārada.
